__e: I want to know exactly what he's doing here and why he is talking to him:

I told him I'd speak to you and let him know.

I talked only to Stan... not his very good friend... and I'm not talking to you.
I told him I'd speak to you and let him know.
I couldn't tell you what he was saying... but the way he talked to her... was the way you talk to a woman.
He was speaking to something or someone that was in that room with us.
Your mother alw ays told me how brilliant you were and for what?
I didn't even know about that. She never talked about your dad.
Did he talk about what kind of a dad I was?
He was a weirdo banging on about good and evil

Yeah, I don't know if she killed herself or what, but there was something weird, and he wouldn't talk about it, so...
What makes you think he talked about it at our house?
She just kept after my dad.
Do you think he was talking about us and the job, or do you think he did something else?
He was never happier than when he was talking about you and that boy.

He didn't mean what he said, he was talking about me, not you.
Pop, the way he talked about you, it was like you... hung the moon.

Yeah, but you didn't know he spent most of that time talking about you or the fact that he blames himself for everything that happened to you.
- Yeah, she's a liar. She has an entry in there about how she wasn't even sure she wanted to be a wife or a mother.

You know, she didn't talk about you much, but I...
